emojipleter.name: Enable Emojipleter
emojipleter.hint: Shows possible emoji completions when typing a colon in chat.

emojipleterMaxResults.name: Emojipleter Max Results
emojipleterMaxResults.hint: The maximum number of emoji search results to show in the emojipleter.

chatReactionsDirectory.name: Custom Emojis Directory
chatReactionsDirectory.hint: You can add more custom emojis for your players to interact with!

compactReactionButton.name: Compact Reaction Button
compactReactionButton.hint: Before any reactions are added to the message, this replaces the add reaction button with a small button in the message header next to the delete button for adding the first reaction so reaction-less messages won't take up extra space.

compactEmojiButton.name: Compact Emoji Button
compactEmojiButton.hint: This replaces the add emoji button in the textbox with
